title: Resolution regarding the Election for the Position of Prime Minister
description: Calls for an election for a new Prime Minister.
content:
**A RESOLUTION**
*of the Congress of the Bayer Free State*

entitled "Resolution regarding the Election for the Position of Prime Minister", reference number: RES_30-4-2021/00001

__RESOLVED__ that:
1. An election shall be held on the 6th of May 2021 to choose a new Prime Minister for the server.
2. The mentioned election shall be held under the same rules and in the same manners as the previous elections.
3. The term of the current Prime Minister shall end when the new Prime Minister swears in.

This Resolution shall require a supermajority in order to pass the Congress.
